name: Space Sim Demo
description:
Controls:

AD = Yaw WS = Pitch OP = Roll Shift = Speed up Space = Slow Down Esc = End Game

Space Sim is a space flight game I developed in Unity originally for a university project, but I am looking at making it more fully featured in the future.

The game revolves around flying a ship through an asteroid field collecting pieces of its broken engine in order to escape the field, the different difficulties involve collecting more or less of these parts.
